alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Geneva, northwestern Jackson and northeastern Holmes Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Graceville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Graceville, Hartford, Slocomb, Malvern, Esto, Noma, Black, Fadette, Kellys Crossroads, Holmes County Airport, Tendil Crossing, Highfalls, Dundee, Holland Crossroads, Hendrix Crossroad, Ards Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads and Noma Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
